    ChatDetailWindow - Class in application

    checkForValidUserName(String) - Static method in class application.UserNameRecognizer
    Validates a username string according to the following rules: Must start with a letter (A-Z, a-z) Can contain letters (A-Z, a-z), digits (0-9), periods (.), dashes (-), and underscores (_) Characters after a period, dash, or underscore must be letters or digits Must be between 4 and 16 characters in length This method implements a finite state machine to validate the username.
